subject: style: replace emojis with Ionicons across the app
body:
Updated UI components to use consistent Ionicons instead of emojis:

Components:
- BackButton: ← → chevron-back
- ChatListItem: × → close icon
- InAppNotification: ✕ → close icon
- MessageBubble: ↩️ → arrow-undo (swipe reply indicator)
- ReplyPreviewBar: ✕ → close icon
- EmptyState: Now uses iconName prop with Ionicons (default: chatbubbles-outline)

Screens:
- home.tsx: Create (add-circle-outline), Join (enter-outline) buttons
- chat/[id].tsx: Error state, empty chat, refresh button
- create.tsx: Error state
- _layout.tsx: Initialization error state

All error states now use alert-circle-outline with error color.
All close/dismiss buttons use consistent close icon.
title: replace emojis with Ionicons across the app
